feed.title: SAP Community - Certification
feed.subtitle: Certification blog posts in SAP Community

entry.title: Become a Certified SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Project Manager
entry.content:
In the dynamic world of digital transformation, where businesses are constantly evolving to stay competitive, project management is more crucial than ever. Central to this landscape is the role of professionals equipped to manage complex cloud projects. With the newly launched SAP Certification for Managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Projects (C_S4PM), you can now become a certified project manager and take charge of leading transformative initiatives.

Designed for Project Managers, Consultants, and Technical Leads, this certification empowers you to excel in managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition implementations, positioning you as a key player in your organization's digital transformation projects with strategic guidance and expert integration.

How can you prepare for this certification?

You can prepare for the exam in your own pace, by completing the "Managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Projects" learning journey, designed to provide comprehensive insight into SAP S/4HANA Cloud project management. With free access to the learning journey, you can deepen your expertise of managing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition implementations, specifically focusing on SAP tools, methodologies, and SAP Business Suite portfolio.

Additionally, SAP Community blog posts provide some supporting information to deepen your understanding and preparation:

  • "Guiding Your Cloud Journey: The New SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition - Adoption Plan Roadmap"
  • "SAP Partner: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Implementation Tools Overview"
  • "News from SAP Activate - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2502 and more"

You can also explore more insights about SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition on SAP for Me and taking a look at the release notes.

As a prerequisite, candidates should possess project management experience, preferred in ERP implementation, especially SAP Cloud-related projects. Additionally, hands-on experience with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition solutions and experience with managing cloud-based SAP projects is beneficial.

Kickstart your journey today

By becoming a certified project manager for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, you will be able to position yourself as a key contributor to your organization's growth and innovation. You can demonstrate a high level of competency in orchestrating SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition projects, showcasing expertise and leadership in cloud initiatives that are aligned with business objectives.

Certified learners need to continuously keep their skills up-to-date and certifications valid by completing mandatory assessments before their certification expires. With an SAP Learning Hub subscription, you can prepare for and take the stay certified assessments at any time during the validity period of your certification.  If you want to know more on how to get and stay certified, you can read this blog post.

Open new professional opportunities for you with new learning and a sought-after certification. Build the skills you need on the SAP Learning site and get inspired by reading learner stories on SAP Community, ask questions and connect with fellow learners. When you‚Äôre ready, take your certification exam and start shaping your industry's future!

entry.title: SAP Certification: One-Stop-Shop for Enteprise Architects and Transformation Consultants
entry.content:
Hello! I'm Mark Anderson, Business Transformation Management (BTM) Lead for SAP Partners in the SAP Industries & Experience team, otherwise known as SIX. Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn.

When it comes to our BTM solutions, I've curated details in effort to simplify your SAP Certification journey. Feel free to comment below on what worked for you or ask a question to me and our SMEs. Let's get started!

  • If you haven't already, I strongly recommend reading and bookmarking this blog from some of my colleagues. It covers our certification model, partner requirements, and a robust FAQ section. There is one section specifically relevant:

By July 2025, all partner resources in key roles ‚Äì enterprise architects, developers, business transformation management consultants, project managers involved in RISE with SAP projects ‚Äì must have a valid SAP certification. By the end of 2025, it is expected that 50% of relevant partner practitioners will hold at least one valid certification in the SAP solution portfolio. Overall, this means that SAP partners will need to continuously update and expand their skills.

SAP offers nine different certifications for Enterprise Architects and Business Transformation Consultants. The chart below outlines each certification, it's corresponding Learning Journey, time estimates, and where to find details on "Stay Certified" content to ensure your certification remains active for years to come. 

 

Title

Certification

Relevant Learning Journey***

SAP Signavio Process Management Consultant

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

C_SIGPM_2403

Managing Business Processes with SAP Signavio Solutions

SAP Signavio Process Data Analyst Consultant

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

C_SIGDA_2403

Analyzing Business Processes with SAP Signavio Solutions

Business Transformation Consultant *NEW for 2025*

Get Certified*

C_SIGBT_2409

Exploring Business and Solution Transformation Tools and Methodology

SAP LeanIX Consultant

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

C_LIXEA_2404

Learning to Use the LeanIX Tool for Successful Enterprise Architecture

WalkME Digital Adoption Consultant

*New for 2025*

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

C_WME_2506

Starting your Digital Adoption Journey: WalkMe Fundamentals

Project Manager ‚Äì SAP Activate

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

C_ACT_2403

Implementation Tools and Methodology

Project Manager - Agile

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

E_ACTAI_2403

Agile Project Delivery

Implementation Tools and Methodology

SAP Enterprise Architect

Get Certified* 

Stay Certified**

P_SAPEA_2023

Applying the SAP Enterprise Architecture Framework

SAP Cloud ALM

Get Certified*

Stay Certfied**

C_STC_2405

Solution Transformation with Cloud ALM

SAP Activate Project Manager

SAP Activate Agile Project Manager for Agile Implementation Management

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

C_ACT_2403

Get Certified*

Stay Certified**

E_ACTAI_2403

Discovering SAP Activate - Implementation Tools and Methodology

Discovering SAP Activate - Agile Project Delivery

 

Subscribe and bookmark this blog to be notified each time it's updated and/or revised. Don't hesitate to ask questions or share your certification journey below in the comments! 

* Requires Subscription or Purchased Attempts

** Requires Learning Hub Partner Edition

*** Free

entry.title: TIVIT obtiene certificaci√≥n SAP regional y reafirma su liderazgo en Am√©rica Latina
entry.content:
En una entrevista con nuestro socio de larga trayectoria TIVIT, una empresa l√≠der en tecnolog√≠a en Am√©rica Latina con presencia en varios pa√≠ses de la regi√≥n, nos cuentan c√≥mo apoyan la transformaci√≥n digital de sus clientes y garantizan los m√°s altos est√°ndares en la operaci√≥n de soluciones SAP.

Tambi√©n nos comparten detalles sobre su estructura regional y sus capacidades de servicio, que se ven reforzadas con la primera certificaci√≥n regional de sus operaciones.

 

¬øPara comenzar podr√≠a contarnos sobre su empresa y los servicios que ofrece?

TIVIT es una empresa l√≠der en servicios de tecnolog√≠a en Am√©rica Latina, con presencia en varios pa√≠ses de la regi√≥n. Se especializa en ofrecer soluciones integrales de TI que apoyan la transformaci√≥n digital de sus clientes, combinando innovaci√≥n, escalabilidad y eficiencia operativa.

Su portafolio de servicios abarca una amplia gama de soluciones dise√±adas para acompa√±ar a las empresas en su transformaci√≥n digital. En el √°rea de Cloud Solutions, TIVIT ofrece servicios de migraci√≥n, gesti√≥n y operaci√≥n de entornos en la nube p√∫blica, privada e h√≠brida, adapt√°ndose a las necesidades espec√≠ficas de cada cliente. A trav√©s de su unidad de Digital Business, desarrolla soluciones digitales innovadoras, impulsa la automatizaci√≥n de procesos, aplica anal√≠tica avanzada y mejora la experiencia del cliente.

En materia de Cybersecurity, proporciona servicios integrales de protecci√≥n, monitoreo, gesti√≥n de identidades y respuesta ante incidentes, garantizando la seguridad de los entornos digitales. Su l√≠nea de Technology Platforms se centra en la administraci√≥n y operaci√≥n de infraestructura tecnol√≥gica, incluyendo centros de datos y redes, asegurando alta disponibilidad y eficiencia operativa.

Finalmente, en el √°mbito de los SAP Services, TIVIT cuenta con una oferta especializada que incluye la operaci√≥n, administraci√≥n y soporte de soluciones SAP, con un enfoque particular en SAP S/4HANA y SAP HANA, consolidando as√≠ su compromiso con la excelencia y la innovaci√≥n tecnol√≥gica.

Gracias a su enfoque regional y a sus certificaciones internacionales, TIVIT se posiciona como un socio estrat√©gico para empresas que buscan eficiencia, confiabilidad y transformaci√≥n tecnol√≥gica en entornos complejos.

 

¬øPor qu√© decidi√≥ en 2008 certificar sus servicios como socio de operaciones de SAP?

La decisi√≥n respondi√≥ a una estrategia de negocio clara y alineada con la evoluci√≥n del mercado. En ese momento, el n√∫mero de clientes que adoptaban soluciones SAP crec√≠a de forma sostenida, y como proveedores de servicios tecnol√≥gicos, entendimos que deb√≠amos ser parte activa de ese ecosistema. Adem√°s, identificamos que nuestros clientes necesitaban concentrarse en el desarrollo de su negocio, delegando la operaci√≥n t√©cnica -especialmente los servicios SAP Basis- en un socio confiable. Para ofrecer ese respaldo, era fundamental contar con una certificaci√≥n oficial que acreditara la calidad y el nivel t√©cnico de nuestros servicios, validada por la misma SAP. En resumen, certificar nuestros servicios fue un paso esencial para construir una oferta s√≥lida, competitiva y alineada con los m√°s altos est√°ndares del mercado.

 

TIVIT opera en varios pa√≠ses de Am√©rica Latina, Ahora, por primera vez, TIVIT ha recibido la certificaci√≥n regional para la operaci√≥n de soluciones SAP S/4HANA y la operaci√≥n de SAP HANA, para los pa√≠ses de Per√∫, Chile y Colombia. ¬øPor qu√© han decidido optar por la certificaci√≥n regional?

Efectivamente, TIVIT opera en m√∫ltiples pa√≠ses de Am√©rica Latina, y avanzar hacia un modelo regional ha sido un paso natural en la evoluci√≥n de nuestra gesti√≥n y atenci√≥n de servicios TI. Esta regionalizaci√≥n nos ha llevado a redise√±ar nuestro modelo de operaci√≥n, con el objetivo de ofrecer una experiencia m√°s integrada, eficiente y con est√°ndares homog√©neos de calidad. En ese contexto, optar por una certificaci√≥n regional responde a la necesidad de validar, de manera objetiva y consistente, el nivel de excelencia con el que operamos las soluciones SAP en todos los pa√≠ses donde tenemos presencia. Es una forma de garantizar a nuestros clientes que, sin importar el pa√≠s, recibir√°n un servicio de clase mundial.

 

¬øH√°blenos un poco m√°s sobre sobre sus capacidades regionales para atender los servicios y operaciones SAP?

Nuestra presencia regional se ha construido a lo largo del tiempo, con una evoluci√≥n constante en cada uno de los pa√≠ses donde operamos. Cada mercado ha desarrollado sus propias capacidades para atender y brindar servicios de forma aut√≥noma, fortaleciendo as√≠ el m√∫sculo regional de TIVIT. En particular, los servicios SAP han sido un pilar estrat√©gico en todas nuestras operaciones, lo que nos ha permitido consolidar un equipo t√©cnico y profesional altamente calificado. Gracias a esta estructura regional y a la certificaci√≥n obtenida, hoy contamos con una capacidad de atenci√≥n que no solo destaca por su nivel t√©cnico, sino tambi√©n por su amplio alcance y cobertura en toda la regi√≥n.

 

¬øQu√© impacto tendr√° la certificaci√≥n regional en la percepci√≥n de los clientes sobre TIVIT?

Si bien creemos que esta es una respuesta que idealmente deber√≠an dar nuestros propios clientes, lo que algunos de ellos ya nos han compartido nos permite afirmar que la certificaci√≥n regional incrementa significativamente su confianza en TIVIT. Contar con una acreditaci√≥n que valide nuestro nivel y calidad t√©cnica en la entrega de servicios -especialmente con alcance regional- transmite tranquilidad, refuerza la percepci√≥n de que estamos a la vanguardia del sector y consolida nuestra capacidad de ofrecer soluciones consistentes y de alto nivel desde cualquiera de los pa√≠ses en los que operamos.

 

La informaci√≥n sobre el programa de certificaci√≥n para socios operativos y una visi√≥n general de todos los socios certificados se puede encontrar en SAP Operations Partner Guide.

entry.title: TIVIT‚Äôs Strategic Approach to Driving Cloud Migration and Digital Transformation
entry.content:
In this interview, our long-standing partner TIVIT outlines its structured approach to digital transformation, driven by a dedicated Line of Business established in Brazil. The company shares insights into its experience as a certified operations partner, including its recent achievement in SAP BTP operations. The conversation also touches on how TIVIT supports clients on their journey to SAP S/4HANA cloud, aligning with RISE with SAP and GROW with SAP. Readers will gain a clear view of TIVIT‚Äôs technical capabilities and strategic direction in enabling scalable and secure digital transformation across Latin America.

 

To begin, could you tell us about TIVIT and the range of services you offer to your clients in the region?

TIVIT is a Brazilian multinational company that connects technology for a better world. With over 25 years of experience and operations in ten Latin American countries, it specializes in creating transformative digital projects. Through its constantly evolving business lines, the company supports organizations in ensuring sustainability and scalability with cloud solutions (public, hybrid, and private), enables secure environments with cybersecurity resources, develops technologies focused on Artificial Intelligence, and offers services in automation and SaaS solutions. The digital transformation driven by TIVIT impacts millions of people daily. 

 

Since TIVIT's first certification, the company has expanded the certification scope‚Äîre-certifying its initial certification several times and adding new ones. Most recently, TIVIT was certified for SAP BTP operations. What was the deciding factor behind this decision?

SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) is a strategic pillar for digital transformation and operational efficiency, and it also plays a key role in the Clean Core strategy, ensuring a more agile, flexible, and standardized ERP. To keep up with market evolution, TIVIT has invested in creating a dedicated and highly qualified team, with professionals certified in SAP BTP. Being a certified operations partner for SAP BTP reinforces our commitment to innovation, operational excellence, and the delivery of high-value solutions to our clients, ensuring governance over our processes.

 

SAP continues to align its strategy with the cloud and encourages partners to play an active role in supporting customers throughout their migration journey. How do you plan to support your customers in their ongoing digital transformation? 

TIVIT is committed to expanding its expertise in SAP cloud solutions and aims to increase the number of certifications in this area by 40% in 2025. This growth reflects our strategic positioning as a business partner, actively supporting migrations to SAP S/4HANA Cloud in Brazil, through the Rise with SAP and Grow with SAP offerings.

 

Can you elaborate on TIVIT‚Äôs approach to Cloud migration support and what sets your digital transformation strategy apart for clients?

Since the creation of a dedicated Line of Business (LoB) for SAP offerings in Brazil in 2022, TIVIT has established itself as a strategic partner to drive digital transformation. With a team of over 450 specialized professionals, we work on migration projects and comprehensive management of SAP environments, offering a 360-degree approach that encompasses infrastructure, functional support, user and consumption control, cybersecurity, process consulting, and modernization. Our expertise delivers efficiency, innovation, and security, enabling our clients to maximize value and reduce costs through SAP solutions.

 

 

Information on the certification program for operations partners and an overview of all certified partners can be found in the SAP Operations Partner Guide.

Visit OPC at SAP.com

entry.title: Taking Flight with SAP: Marco's Journey to SAP Champion
entry.content:
‚ÄúIn a world that is constantly reinventing itself, I enjoy collecting and passing on knowledge and always thinking one step ahead.‚Äù  That mindset has guided Marco B√ºscher from his early days supporting flight operations in the military to becoming a highly skilled SAP consultant and solution architect.  

Over the past 15 years, his drive to understand how various business processes fit together has led him to master multiple SAP solutions. What started as a curiosity has evolved into expertise, and Marco now thrives in the dynamic world of business informatics, constantly learning and growing, both as a professional and a mentor. 

Marco‚Äôs SAP journey began after his time in the German Armed Forces, where he gained invaluable insights into flight operations. It was there he realized the importance of understanding complex systems from all angles, a lesson he later applied to his work with SAP software. He first encountered SAP solutions in his professional life as a business IT specialist, quickly recognizing how the system‚Äôs many modules could integrate to manage business processes effectively. 

A Personal Learning Sabbatical 

Over the years, Marco‚Äôs curiosity pushed him to continually expand his knowledge. ‚ÄúI received my first certification in 2009, when SAP S/4HANA was still a long way off,‚Äù he recalls. ‚ÄúOver the years, SAP has reinvented itself again and again‚Äù. To keep up with the evolving technology, he decided to take what he calls a ‚Äúlearning sabbatical‚Äù. He used this time to focus on deepening his expertise in SAP solutions and acquiring multiple SAP Certifications in ABAP and SAP S/4HANA solutions.  

‚ÄúMy certifications form the basis for my work as a consultant and technical architect at NTT DATA Deutschland SE,‚Äù he explains. ‚ÄúI utilize this experience to lead the way as a pioneer, provide guidance as a navigator and offer promising solutions as a designer in a complex and ever-changing landscape‚Äù.  

Marco credits SAP Learning Hub for providing clear, well-structured, guided learning resources that helped him to get and stay certified: ‚ÄúThe learning journey was the best way for me to learn SAP,‚Äù he adds. From his perspective, upskilling and training is the only way to unlock the full potential of SAP software. 

"By acquiring knowledge in all key SAP solutions and combining it with my understanding of the system from a developer‚Äôs perspective, I am now able to satisfy customer requirements in both standard and customized SAP solutions‚Äù. 

A Leader and Mentor in the SAP Community 

Marco‚Äôs journey didn‚Äôt stop at mastering the technical aspects of SAP. Today, he is not only an expert in his field but also a mentor, sharing his knowledge and experiences with others who are looking to build their careers in SAP.  Through his active involvement in the SAP Community, particularly his participation in SAP CodeJams, he has become recognized as an SAP Champion, a role that fills him with pride.  

As he continues to guide others, he‚Äôs not just solving complex problems‚Äîhe‚Äôs helping them see the bigger picture and empowering them to chart their own success in SAP. 

The Power of Continuous Learning 

Marco‚Äôs story is a testament to the power of continuous learning and self-improvement. His curiosity, commitment, and the willingness to learn new things has led him to embrace the full potential of SAP and seek out opportunities for growth. In doing so, Marco has not only shaped his own career but is also making a lasting impact on others, as is the goal of every SAP Champion. 

Accelerate your Career Today 

You too can benefit from tailored and self-paced learning opportunities that meet you when and where you learn best on SAP Learning site. Get certified to demonstrate your expertise and boost your career.

entry.title: My Journey to Becoming SAP Certified: From Missed Opportunity to TS410 Success
entry.content:
I don't know if this should be a blog or just a comment under the post about Free SAP Certification and Practice Systems for Students ‚Äî but I felt compelled to share my story.

Late 2023 was a turning point for me. I had just switched careers into the SAP ecosystem and was fortunate to secure a SAP Application Support role in early 2024. By August, I had progressed to an Application Manager position. While the growth was exciting, it came with real-world challenges ‚Äî one of them being the missed opportunity to use the free certification code I received from the Digital Skills Initiative. With work pressures and the need to build foundational SAP knowledge, I couldn't prepare in time, and the code eventually expired. Despite my efforts, I couldn‚Äôt redeem it again.

Still, I didn‚Äôt give up. My interest in SAP had grown into a passion. I later enrolled in a postgraduate ERP (SAP) Functional Consultant programme at one of SAP‚Äôs University Partners, which also qualifies me for the new Digital Skills Initiative (Free SAP Certification and Practice Systems for Students) and access to practice systems. I saw it as a second chance ‚Äî and I grabbed it with both hands.

I activated my student subscription through the initiative and committed to my studies with renewed focus. I‚Äôm beyond thrilled (and honestly, emotional) to share that I passed my SAP Certified Application Associate ‚Äì Business Process Integration with SAP S/4HANA (TS410) certification exam on Sunday, May 11th ‚Äî Mother's Day. It was a significant day for me both personally and professionally. That day now holds even more meaning for me ‚Äî and the cover photo I‚Äôve used here was actually a Mother's Day gift, symbolizing celebration, growth, and gratitude.

To those just beginning their journey or feeling discouraged after a setback ‚Äî I want you to know: don‚Äôt give up. Your path may not be linear or perfect, but every experience builds you. These SAP resources, from learning journeys to practice systems and community support, are truly invaluable. Make the most of them. Keep learning, keep growing, and show up for yourself every step of the way.

To the SAP Learning team and everyone behind the @Digital Skills Initiative ‚Äî thank you for making global upskilling a reality. To fellow learners and community members: you‚Äôve got this. üí™üåü

entry.title: Introducing the Get Certified Series for SAP Certified Professional - Developer - SAP Commerce Cloud
entry.content:
Are you aiming to become a certified SAP Commerce Cloud developer? Do you want to deepen your understanding of the platform and confidently prepare for the P_C4H34 certification exam? We‚Äôre excited to announce a comprehensive Get Certified live session series designed specifically to support you on this journey!

Overview

This series

Get Certified: SAP Certified Professional - Developer - SAP Commerce Cloud

features expert-led knowledge transfer sessions conducted by certified trainers who will guide you through all the key topics necessary to succeed in the P_C4H34: SAP Certified Professional - Developer - SAP Commerce Cloud exam. The goal? To provide you with targeted, instructor-led support that complements your self-study efforts, helping you build confidence and mastery of the exam content.

For registration, simply log in with your valid Learning Hub subscription (for SAP internal teams, it‚Äôs FREE) and register to reserve your spot.

Why Attend?

Preparing for certification involves more than just studying on your own. Our live sessions offer:

  • Expert guidance: Learn directly from experienced trainers who understand what‚Äôs required to pass.
  • Focused walkthroughs: Dive deep into critical topics and exam question types.
  • Resources and references: Obtain valuable materials to extend your learning after each session.
  • Q&A opportunities: Clarify doubts and get tips for the exam.

Please note, this series is different from the previous live session recording, "Certification Live Session: SAP Commerce Cloud - Developer Certification Preparation" While that session provided a helpful overview of the essential exam topics, it did not delve into each area with detailed explanations, sample questions, or comprehensive coverage.

Our upcoming Get Certified series offers a deeper, more focused approach, with expert-guided walkthroughs of key topics, practical tips, and sample questions designed to maximize your exam readiness.

How to Prepare

Start your certification journey by reviewing the Trainings or Learning Journeys associated with SAP Commerce Cloud listed at the end of this blog post. These will give you a road map of what to learn. Then, participate in our live sessions to receive a structured, guided review of exam content, focusing on the most important areas for success.

Session Breakdown

Here's what we have planned:

Session 1: Kick-Off (1 hour)

  • Introduction to the series and certification
  • Explanation of exam question types and tips on preparation
  • Walkthrough of sample questions using the exam interface

Session 2: Exploring Platform Basics and Platform Features (1.5 hours)

  • Review of core platform concepts
  • Understanding the system architecture and key functionalities essential for the exam

Session 3: Mastering Product Content Management & Commerce (1 hour)

  • Insights into managing product data
  • Managing commerce operations within SAP Commerce Cloud

Session 4: Navigating Customer Experience, Order Management, Customer Services, and Backoffice Framework (1.5 hours)

  • Deep dive into the web content management module (WCMS)
  • Managing orders, customer services, and backoffice functionalities

Session 5: Understanding Commerce Cloud and Cloud Portal, Integration Support and Managing Clean Core (1 hour)

  • Overview of SAP Commerce Cloud (in the public Cloud) and Cloud Portal UI
  • Overview for the integration support of SAP Commerce Cloud
  • How to manage the Clean Core principal in SAP

Learning Objectives

By participating in this series, you will:

  • Gain a clear understanding of the exam structure and scope
  • Cover the essential topic areas required for certification success
  • Build confidence to attempt the P_C4H34 exam with expert guidance and practice

Relevant Learning Journeys

To maximize your preparation(best before attending the get certified series), review the following Trainings or Learning Journeys:

  • Managing Clean Core for SAP S/4HANA Cloud, and 
  • either:
    • SAP Commerce Cloud Developer Part 1
    • SAP Commerce Cloud Developer Part 2
  • or:
    • Exploring the Technical Essentials of SAP Commerce Cloud
    • Expanding upon Technical Essentials of SAP Commerce Cloud
    • Mastering the Technical Essentials of SAP Commerce Cloud

Ready to take your SAP Commerce Cloud skills to the next level and achieve certification? Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to learn from the best, clarify your doubts, and prepare effectively for the P_C4H34 exam. 

See you in July or October! Let‚Äôs get certified together!

entry.title: How students can get certified free and FAST in SAP (Less than 7 hours!)
entry.content:
Hi Everyone, 

I‚Äôd like to share information about a new type of certification available for SAP partners, employees, and students. This certification, known as the business certification, is now accessible free of charge through the SAP Learning Hub, student edition. The name of the certification is "Positioning SAP Business Suite," and it provides a comprehensive overview of the SAP Business Suite concept. 

This certification covers how consultants align SAP Business Suite features with customer infrastructure and communicate effectively to ensure a successful implementation. It's a fantastic introduction to SAP's offerings and an efficient way to earn an SAP certification. With just one or two days of study, you can enhance your CV with this new credential. 

 

Step 1: Register for your free subscription 

 To begin, the first step is to successfully verify and sign up for SAP Learning Hub, student edition. I have detailed the full process for registration here in this blog to guide you through it. 

 

Step 2: Find the content you need to study 

 Once your registration is complete and your subscription is activated, the SAP Business Suite learning journey and certification will become visible within the Student Zone upon logging in with your newly activated free subscription. (Scroll down a bit and you will see it in the first content carousel.) 

Alternately, you can access the two relevant courses here: 

1.‚ÄØDiscovering SAP for Students 

2.‚ÄØPositioning SAP Business Suite for Students (This is the content gated for successful registrants to SAP Learning Hub, student edition. You can‚Äôt see it until go you through this process.) 

 

Step 3: Start studying and do the practical exercise 

You can get yourself familiar with SAP solutions through hands-on practice based on a real business case. In this video, you can see how it works and some tips on the first step of the practice. 

 

 Note: Most of the knowledge required to pass the exam can be acquired through the courses listed above. However, I recommend you better familiarize yourself with SAP Business Data Cloud before proceeding - this is the most difficult component of the exam for some students. Read more here: Positioning SAP Business Data Cloud. 

 

Step 4: Scheduling your exam  

After completing the practical exercise, your ability to schedule your exam will be unlocked.  

Follow the example demo here but, be sure to use the exam code for SAP Business Suite instead of what you see in the demo. 

 If at any point you need support with the process, please go to the SAP Certification support page. 

 Best of luck and congratulations in advance for earning your first official SAP credential. 

Regards, 

David

entry.title: Supporting the Cloud-Journey: A New Chapter for our SAP HANA Cloud Certification
entry.content:
As part of our SAP Certification for Operations Partners program, we offer a range of certifications that recognize partners delivering high-quality services for SAP¬Æ solutions and supporting customers on their digital transformation journeys. To reflect the growing importance of cloud technologies, we‚Äôve updated our SAP HANA operations certification, now titled ‚ÄúSAP HANA Cloud and database operations.‚Äù

The cloud is no longer a destination but a continuous journey of optimization and innovation. To help our partners confidently lead their customers on this path, we‚Äôve enhanced the certification to focus on the practical, day-to-day realities of SAP HANA Cloud deployments.

The updated certification places stronger emphasis on cloud-related content and highlights the core competencies required for:

  • Seamless migrations to SAP HANA Cloud
  • Operational management of SAP HANA Cloud instances, including performance monitoring and security

By demonstrating these skills, partners reinforce their role in confidently guiding customers through every phase of their cloud journey.

With its expanded scope, the certification now reflects a partner‚Äôs end-to-end expertise across the SAP HANA Cloud lifecycle - serving as a strong differentiator in delivering sustained value in the cloud.

Existing certified partners will benefit from these enhancements at no additional cost and will complete the extended content during their next re-certification audit.

 

SAP Certifications for Operations Partners - overview of certifications

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Information on the certification program for operations partners and an overview of all certified partners can be found in the SAP Operations Partner Guide.

entry.title: Your First Step into AI with SAP: Start Learning, Get Certified, Drive Innovation
entry.content:
The world of business technology is evolving rapidly, and AI is leading the charge. This is more than just a trend; it‚Äôs an opportunity for everyone to reshape how businesses run. If you're curious about how artificial intelligence fits into the SAP landscape and wondering how to get started, you‚Äôre in the right place.

Whether you‚Äôre a developer, consultant, business user, or architect, SAP has created accessible and relevant resources to help you take your first steps into AI confidently. Let‚Äôs break it down.

 

Why Start Learning AI Now?

AI isn‚Äôt just futuristic, it‚Äôs happening now, and it‚Äôs transforming industries in real time. SAP‚Äôs Business AI strategy is about embedding intelligence into business processes to drive better decisions, automate tasks, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

By beginning your AI journey today, you‚Äôll:

  • Understand how AI is being applied across SAP solutions
  • Gain the skills to build or extend intelligent applications on SAP Business Technology Platform
  • Get ahead in your career by being part of an emerging and in-demand field

 

Get Started: Follow Self-Paced Learning Journeys

SAP provides structured learning paths for you to build your understanding and prepare you for the SAP Generative AI Developers certification.

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs included:

Exploring the SAP Business AI Portfolio: Get a broad view of SAP‚Äôs AI offerings and how they solve real business challenges.

Using SAP AI Core on SAP BTP: Manage AI solutions with SAP AI Core and AI Launchpad.

LLM Fundamentals for Your Use Case: Learn how large language models (LLMs) work and how to use them effectively.

Prompting & Problem Solving with Generative AI Hub: Apply advanced prompting strategies to tackle real business use cases

 

 

 

 

Dive Deeper: Join Live Sessions Designed for Beginners

As part of your SAP Learning Hub subscription, you can join live expert-led sessions designed to help you grasp the fundamentals of AI in the SAP landscape, no prior AI experience required.

  • Introduction to SAP Business AI
    Learn SAP‚Äôs vision for Business AI, get familiar with key generative AI concepts, and see how tools like Joule are transforming enterprise applications.
  • Introduction to Agentic AI
    Discover how SAP is building intelligent agents using techniques like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Multi-Context Planning (MCP) and why data foundation matters in enterprise AI.

These sessions offer a hands-on, approachable starting point and are a great way to build confidence before getting certified.

 

Become Certified: SAP Generative AI Developer

When you're ready, validate your knowledge and skills with the SAP Certification for Generative AI Developers. It‚Äôs a great way to stand out, demonstrate your expertise, and build confidence as a next-gen SAP professional.

 

Get Started Today

Starting your AI journey with SAP doesn‚Äôt have to be overwhelming. With live sessions, structured learning journeys, and a clear certification path, you have all the tools you need to grow. And the best part? You‚Äôre learning with a global community of professionals committed to innovation. Plus, take advantage of local and free hands-on SAP CodeJam events to deepen your skills, connect with experts, and apply what you‚Äôve learned in a collaborative, real-world environment.

 

So if you‚Äôve been thinking, ‚ÄúI want to learn AI but don‚Äôt know where to begin,‚Äù this is your sign. Start small, stay curious, and let SAP guide you toward your AI-powered future.

Explore. Learn. Get certified. Drive innovation.

entry.title: "Certification Elevated My Confidence and Brand": How Rudy‚Äôs Commitment to Learning Inspires Others
entry.content:
Rudy Abrahams describes himself as ‚Äúan introvert who is not shy‚Äù ‚Äî a lifelong learner, activist for equity and equality, and a passionate advocate for healthy living. Growing up in humble beginnings in South Africa, Rudy‚Äôs early life shaped the values he holds today: resilience, fairness, and a deep belief in continuous self-improvement. Now an SAP employee based in Singapore, he balances his high-paced career with family life, proudly married to Dorianne for 25 years and raising two sons. 

‚ÄúI love anything that includes healthy living (in all aspects of health),‚Äù Rudy shares. ‚ÄúAnd I‚Äôm a lifelong learner ‚Äî it‚Äôs something I do naturally.‚Äù 

A Leadership Journey Across Continents 

Since joining SAP in 2017, Rudy has embraced change, leadership, and growth at every step. Over just eight years, he has held five major roles across five countries, including Head of Presales in EMEA, Head of Digital Transformation Office in Southeast Asia, Head of SAP SuccessFactors in SEA, and President & Country MD in the Philippines. Today, he serves as Head of Industry & Value Advisory for SAP APAC. 

Through it all, Rudy credits his success to self-discipline and focus. His daily routine starts early: "I rise at 5am to meditate, then 45 minutes of exercise, and I start work at 8am. I'm flat out until 6pm daily." His workday is filled with customer engagements, leadership meetings, and supporting SAP‚Äôs Customer Advisory Team. 

Leading by Example with SAP Certification 

But despite his busy schedule, personal growth and leading by example are high priorities for Rudy. True to his leadership style, he believes in setting the standard for his team. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not willing to ask my team to do anything I‚Äôm not willing to do myself,‚Äù he says. 

Rudy Abrahams, Head of Industry & Value Advisory for SAP APACThis was just one of the reasons Rudy made the decision to pursue an SAP Certification. He saw it as an opportunity to inspire through action while enhancing his own skillset. Although the certification was not mandatory for Rudy, he likes to lead from the front. "Closing skills gaps starts with leaders who commit to learning, and certified teams drive better outcomes ‚Äì it's that simple,‚Äù Rudy explains. "I also know that this certification is an investment in my credibility and knowledge." 

He chose to certify in Positioning SAP Business Suite, one of SAP‚Äôs newest offerings for all SAP employees and partners. It includes practical exercises that build skills to help position SAP Business Suite, so was the ideal choice to strengthen Rudy‚Äôs product and strategic knowledge. But the journey wasn‚Äôt always smooth. 

‚ÄúIt was fun upfront, but the exam was fairly tough for me,‚Äù he admits. After failing his first attempt, Rudy didn‚Äôt give up. ‚ÄúI was disappointed but motivated to pass, so I decided to study hard and rebooked my test.‚Äù Passing the exam brought a renewed sense of confidence: ‚ÄúI feel much more confident and liberated now, especially knowing this was not an easy certificate to secure. I feel beyond proud.‚Äù 

Transforming Confidence into Connections 

The benefits of certification extended far beyond product-related skills. Rudy found that it increased his visibility and credibility within SAP. ‚ÄúI have elevated my brand in our business,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúI met new colleagues who walked up to me and asked me for tips and insights.‚Äù This unexpected networking has created new friendships and stronger professional bonds.  

Beyond professional recognition, the experience boosted Rudy‚Äôs personal sense of achievement. "It made me feel like I could achieve just about anything." What‚Äôs more, Rudy's example has inspired others to follow his lead: ‚ÄúMany of my colleagues have turned to me and told me they are motivated to do their certification too. It‚Äôs a win-win for all, I guess.‚Äù 

A Lifelong Learning Mindset 

For Rudy, the journey doesn't stop here. Learning has always been a way of life ‚Äî a philosophy he‚Äôs lived through every chapter of his career and personal growth. Although it requires dedication, time and motivation, he believes it's well worth the investment. ‚ÄúLifelong learning isn‚Äôt a choice anymore, it‚Äôs a mindset.‚Äù 

As SAP and the wider technology world continue to evolve, Rudy‚Äôs story is a reminder that investing in yourself ‚Äî even when it‚Äôs tough ‚Äî opens new doors, builds new relationships, and paves the way for even greater success. 

Start your own success story    

Did you feel inspired by Rudy‚Äôs story? Then kick-start your own success story with SAP today. Benefit from tailored and self-paced learning opportunities that meet you when and where you learn best on SAP Learning site. Get certified to demonstrate your expertise and boost your career.

entry.title: Register Now: SAP Partner- Cert Certified Academies for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (Q2- 2025)
entry.content:
For SAP Partners only 

We would like to invite you to the upcoming SAP enablement offering: Partner Get- Certified Academies for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

You will need a valid SAP Partner S User ID and a valid SAP Universal ID to access the links and register for the sessions

Dates : 18th June ; 23rd to 26th June

  • Option 1: Morning Session: 09:00 AM to 12:00 PM CET
  • Option 2: Evening Session: 04:00 PM to 07:00 PM CET

In Q2 edition of this event, we will run certification academies for the 4 GROW/ SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition - certifications.

  • 18th June  - Implementation Consultant ‚Äì Register (Mandatory to all LOB Certifications)
  • 23rd & 24th June - Financial Accounting Part 1 & Financial Accounting Part 2- Register
  • 25th June - Sourcing & Procurement ‚Äì Register
  • 26th June - Sales ‚Äì Register

Description:

Accelerate your timelines to get certified on the SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition -Certifications! Join this academy to obtain the certification guidance pertaining to the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Certification - (SAP Certified Associate ‚Äì Implementation Consultant) and Line of Business Certifications.

Learning Objective(s):

  • Allowing learners to build familiarity & understand certification guidance across various topics, covered in the SAP Learning Journeys, which reduces the time spent in the self-paced consumption of LJs.
  • Understanding of key concepts, tips & tricks to optimally consume the SAP Learning Journeys while preparing for SAP Certification exam.

Target Audience:

  • SAP S/4HANA - LoB Consultants ( and/or) SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Professionals looking to get certified on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Edition Certifications. 

Roles:

  • Architect, Consultant / Delivery, Developer, Project Manager, Technical Consultant

entry.title: Certification and Beyond: Stories from SAP‚Äôs Top Trainers
entry.content:
Tinus Brink and Lisa Merrill have a lot in common: they both work as SAP consultants and trainers; were both commended as SAP‚Äôs highest achieving trainers in the 2024 SAP Authorized Trainer Program; and they‚Äôre both passionate about their respective hobbies. But the similarities don‚Äôt end there. Their deep-rooted commitment for lifelong learning and inspiring others through education shines through everything they do. And both embrace continuous learning through SAP Learning Hub, balancing their professional expertise with rich personal lives and unique interests.  

From Family Support to Global Impact 

Tinus‚Äô SAP career began thanks to his mother-in-law, who took a leap of faith in him and backed his initial journey with a loan on her home. And her belief in him and in SAP paid off. Today, over 20 of Tinus‚Äô family members and friends now work with SAP in some capacity.  

Originally from South Africa, Tinus has been living in Texas for two years and calls it home. With five SAP Certifications under his belt, ‚ÄòTiny‚Äô, as he is affectionately known by those he trains, believes knowledge truly is power: ‚ÄúBeing the consultant with the answers not only builds confidence but also strengthens your ability to support clients effectively,‚Äù he says. ‚ÄúThe skills we gain through SAP training unlock new opportunities for growth and success‚Äù.‚ÄØ 

Over the years, Tinus has had the privilege of participating in inspiring programs like SAP Skills for Africa, the SAP Young Professional Program, and the Dual Study initiative with various universities.  But his love of learning and training extends outside of the workplace. When he‚Äôs not exploring new technologies and experimenting with software and AI, he‚Äôs coaching rugby in local schools.  

‚ÄúSupporting others in their growth and development has always been at the heart of my work‚Äù, he explains. ‚ÄúI take great pride in helping new talent enter the SAP ecosystem and kick-start their careers‚Äù. And it‚Äôs never been easier. The flexibility of remote learning through SAP Learning Hub fits perfectly with his lifestyle: ‚ÄúI can study on weekends or evenings without disrupting family time. I‚Äôve already planned two new certifications this year.‚Äù 

Helping Others Dive Deeper Into Their Potential 

Lisa Merrill, an SAP consultant and SAP Authorized Trainer from Chicago agrees. ‚ÄúSAP Learning Hub has been a wonderful tool and there are days when I wonder how we lived without it. I am a better trainer because I have a place that I can go to 24/7 to read, review, and practice.‚Äù‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 

Like Tinus, Lisa‚Äôs love of learning opened new doors beyond her career. In 1997, while working on a global SAP implementation, she was introduced to the world of scuba diving, completed a course, and it has been a passion ever since. Today, when Lisa isn‚Äôt diving 30-120 feet below sea level in the Bahamas with her family, she‚Äôs diving into a new project or training a new intake of SAP users in a classroom.  

As her SAP skills deepened, so did her impact. Over her 25+ year career, Lisa has been fortunate to work on consulting projects as well as provide training to SAP clients around the globe. But a clear highlight is her involvement in SAP‚Äôs NS2 Serves initiative that provides military veterans with SAP training, certification, and career opportunities after service. The program provides them with new skills and a fresh start. ‚ÄúIt is an honor and a privilege,‚Äù she fondly recalls. ‚ÄúHaving the opportunity to help veterans prepare for SAP Certifications and later hear about the impact it has made on their lives is incredibly rewarding and fulfilling‚Äù. 

Lisa is a firm believer that a lack of training is one of the main reasons projects aren‚Äôt successful.‚ÄØ Over the years she has seen companies design great systems that never reach their potential because users aren‚Äôt sufficiently trained in the systems. ‚ÄúWhen I train, I hope, in some small way, that I am contributing to the overall success of an implementation,‚Äù she shares. ‚ÄúMy motto is: When you stop learning, you stop evolving‚Äù.‚ÄØ  

A Path to Purpose 

For both Lisa and Tinus, SAP Certification wasn‚Äôt just a checkbox. It validated their knowledge, sharpened their skills, and opened meaningful new opportunities to support others on their SAP journeys. With SAP Learning Hub, they‚Äôve been able to stay current, fuel their innate curiosity, and continue doing what they both love most: helping others succeed. 

You too can benefit from self-paced learning opportunities that meet you how you learn best. With SAP Learning Hub, you can unlock guided learning resources including live sessions, practice systems and everything you need to get and stay certified and boost your career.

entry.title: Certified to Inspire: Top Trainers Who Never Stop Learning
entry.content:
Behind every great trainer is a journey shaped by curiosity, resilience, and a drive to help others succeed. For Michael Wegelin, Kouassi Math√©, and Angelo Minutella ‚Äî three of the top trainers commended in the 2024 SAP Authorized Trainer Program ‚Äî SAP Certification wasn‚Äôt just about personal growth. It was about staying relevant, deepening their impact, and unlocking opportunities to support and inspire others in their learning journeys. 

Leading by Example 

Michael Wegelin from Germany is an SAP trainer and ABAP full stack programmer and has been passionate about training since childhood. Back then he bought his first guitar from the money he earned helping his classmates pass their exams. Upon completion of his PhD in physics, he worked as a software engineer and taught coding. He discovered SAP software in 1995 and dedicated four intensive weeks to studying ABAP. Just four weeks later, Michael stepped into the classroom as an SAP trainer and the rest, as they say, is history. 

According to Michael, the best way to learn something is to teach it to other people: ‚ÄúBecause I love learning, I love teaching,‚Äù he explains. When he‚Äôs not staying up-to-date using his SAP Learning Hub subscription, he‚Äôs refreshing his memory on long forgotten IT-related subjects with his two children who are studying computer science.‚ÄØ  

Michael, who has always led by example, obtained his first SAP Certifications in 1995 and hasn‚Äôt looked back. ‚ÄúLearning something new is like discovering a whole new world,‚Äù he shares. In 2024 alone, he completed seven learning journeys for free on SAP Learning site, which helped him pass three SAP Certification exams.  

Training with Purpose 

Like Michael, learning has been an integral part of Kouassi Math√©‚Äôs life from an early age. ‚ÄúAs the son of two teachers, I quickly understood how important training is for oneself and that feeling of joy when knowledge is transferred to others,‚Äù he recalls. 

Kouassi, who is based in France, first discovered SAP solutions when his then employer, an SAP trainer, offered him training to implement SAP projects. 18 years later, he works as a Finance and Controlling SAP consultant and an SAP authorized trainer, and the combination is effective. ‚ÄúTraining adds value to my consulting activities and vice versa,‚Äù he says.  

For Kouassi, training is deeply personal. He‚Äôs passionate about knowledge-sharing and mentoring the next generation of talent. ‚ÄúLearning something new gives me the feeling of having taken another step towards growth,‚Äù he shares. ‚ÄúWhat is also important is to be able to share what I have learned.‚Äù 

As a father of three, Kouassi balances his demanding work life with raising a family and his passion for sport. Remote training via SAP Learning Hub has made this balance easier: ‚ÄúIt allows me to be at home more with my children and still deliver the same quality of training to my students‚Äù. 

Driven by Curiosity 

Passionate about travel, being able to offer remote training sessions and access learning materials online has also been a game-changer for Angelo Minutella. It allows him to teach and learn while travelling and hiking around remote areas of Europe in his 4x4 campervan with his family, sometimes for months at a time. When he‚Äôs not exploring the continent, he spends his free time tinkering with his Raspberry Pi and coding AI applications. 

Based in Switzerland, Angelo began working with SAP Finance and Controlling in 1999‚Äîjust a few years after completing his studies in electronical engineering‚Äîand gradually began offering SAP training. In 2005, after a company downsizing, Angelo struck out on his own and founded a consultancy company. Over time, training became one of the most fulfilling parts of his work and he has since transitioned many of his sessions online, offering virtual courses that fit with his lifestyle. Staying up ‚Äìto date with SAP Certifications has been crucial to his success both as an SAP consultant and an SAP authorized trainer.  

‚ÄúSAP Learning Hub allows me to familiarize myself with new products exactly when I need them for my project work, regardless of my project time or location,‚Äù he explains. ‚ÄúBeing able to learn something new and expand my skills is a privilege.‚Äù 

Shared Lessons and Lasting Impact 

For Michael, Kouassi, and Angelo, learning has never been an obligation. It‚Äôs a core part of who they are and offers a pathway to new insights, stronger credibility, and the ability to support others on their professional journeys. Whether they‚Äôre leading global teams, mentoring new talent, or exploring new technologies, these trainers are united by a common thread: a passion for learning, and a belief in its power to transform lives. 

You too can benefit from self-paced and free learning opportunities that meet you how you learn best. With SAP Learning Hub, you can unlock guided learning resources including live sessions, practice systems and everything you need to get and stay certified and boost your career.

entry.title: Reigniting Purpose Through SAP Certification
entry.content:
Yasir Sheikh, an SAP Project Manager based in Dubai, has spent more than two decades leading ERP transformations across global firms like IBM, PwC, Deloitte, BearingPoint, and EY. With a career dedicated to bridging business and IT, Yasir has always been passionate about delivering high-impact ERP transformations ‚Äî and equally committed to continuously upskilling himself along the way. ‚ÄúWhat drives me most is creating real value for clients while continuously upskilling myself.‚Äù

Staying Ahead

In his current role, Yasir leads implementations of SAP Fieldglass and SAP S/4HANA Cloud, managing teams and aligning delivery with clients across regions. ‚ÄúMy typical day involves managing project teams, aligning delivery plans with clients, resolving cross-functional issues, and ensuring that SAP solutions are implemented effectively and on time.‚Äù Right now, he‚Äôs leading a multi-country SAP Fieldglass solution implementation project for a financial institution in the UAE, from planning to post-go-live support.

With cloud adoption accelerating, Yasir saw the need to deepen his knowledge, even after 22 years in the field. He chose the Implementation Consultant - SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition) Certification to align his hands-on expertise with the latest innovations, and to strengthen his ability to meet client expectations in a cloud-first world. ‚ÄúAlthough I had extensive experience managing SAP projects, I wanted to update my knowledge to match SAP‚Äôs evolving cloud-first strategy,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúI also wanted to show that at 49, it‚Äôs never too late to reinvest in your skills ‚Äî a message I hope can inspire others in the industry.‚Äù

Learning That Connects Directly to Work

Learning something new while managing live client projects wasn‚Äôt easy. But Yasir embraced the challenge. ‚ÄúBalancing active client delivery with late-night study sessions required discipline, but the structure of the free SAP Learning site and the relevance of the learning content made it easier to stay motivated.‚Äù The learning paid off immediately ‚Äî not just in knowledge, but in practical application.

‚ÄúOne of the most energizing aspects was applying new knowledge immediately in my real-world projects, for example connecting cloud configuration concepts to actual client discussions.‚Äù

New Projects, New Purpose

Completing the certification exam brought both professional and personal rewards. It enhanced Yasir‚Äôs credibility with clients, created new career opportunities, and reminded him of why he loves what he does. ‚ÄúIt gave me a renewed sense of professional purpose, and reaffirmed my belief that learning is a lifelong journey,‚Äù he shares. "It also sparked a desire to give back, to contribute more to the SAP community, and mentor younger professionals."

At this stage of his career, Yasir sees continued learning as essential ‚Äî not just for growth, but for relevance. ‚ÄúStaying relevant, sharing knowledge, and proving that learning has no age barrier are most important to me.‚Äù

Are you ready to begin your SAP journey?  Explore the SAP Learning site and take the first step to transform your future.

entry.title: Get Certified in SAP Sales Cloud V2 with Our Live Session Series!
entry.content:
Are you ready to take your career in sales technology to the next level? Do you want to become a go-to expert in implementing one of the most innovative sales solutions on the market? Then mark your calendars!

SAP Learning is thrilled to announce a brand-new live session series designed to help you ace the SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 exam!

Click here to explore the full series and register

Why SAP Sales Cloud Version 2?

In today's fast-paced sales environment, businesses need more than just basic CRM. SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 is a game-changer, empowering sales teams with:

  • AI and Machine Learning: Predictive analytics, intelligent recommendations, and automated insights to help reps prioritize leads and close deals faster.
  • Seamless Integration: Connects effortlessly with the broader SAP ecosystem (ERP, S/4HANA, etc.) for a truly end-to-end business process.
  • Modern User Experience: Intuitive, mobile-first design built on SAP Fiori for enhanced usability and adoption.
  • Flexibility & Extensibility: Low-code/no-code options and an API-first approach for easy customization and integration.

This isn't just about managing customer data; it's about driving intelligent engagement and accelerating business growth. As more companies adopt this powerful solution, the demand for skilled implementation consultants is skyrocketing.

Why Get Certified?

Earning your "SAP Certified Associate - Implementation Consultant - SAP Sales Cloud Version 2" certification demonstrates your foundational knowledge and in-depth skills in implementing and administering this cutting-edge solution. It validates that you:

  • Possess a comprehensive understanding of SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 fundamentals.
  • Can actively participate in project teams focusing on Sales Cloud V2 implementations in a mentored role.
  • Are equipped to configure key sales-specific capabilities, manage master data, and understand extensibility options.
  • Understand critical areas like Lead and Opportunity Management, Activities Management, Mobile App capabilities, and the integration of Machine Learning and Generative AI.

This certification is your badge of excellence, differentiating you in the job market and opening doors to exciting career opportunities!

What You'll Get from These Live Sessions:

This exclusive series of live sessions, led by an SAP expert, is quite simply your best shot at prepping for success. You'll walk away with:

  • Comprehensive Coverage: This is a 6-part live session series, each about an hour long, designed to take you through the entire content of the learning journeys.
  • Deep Dives: Expert-led sessions covering the key topics and modules you'll need to master for the certification exam. You'll get an "expert's eye" on what's truly important for both the exam and real-world application.
  • Practical Insights: Get a feel for actual implementation scenarios and pick up best practices you can use right away.
  • Interactive Learning: Chat directly with SAP experts and get your burning questions answered live.
  • True Confidence: Step into your certification exam feeling completely ready and sure of your abilities.

Seriously, don't let this incredible chance to boost your skills and validate your expertise in SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 slip by!

Check out the link below for the full schedule, all the session details, and make sure to register today:

https://learning.sap.com/live-sessions/get-certified-sap-certified-associate-implementation-consultant-sap-sales-cloud-version-2

Invest in yourself and become the SAP Sales Cloud Version 2 implementation wizard everyone needs. Your next big career move is waiting!

entry.title: What are the best SAP certifications to begin with as a university student?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm a 1st year Computer Science student starting my SAP journey early through the Student Edition. I‚Äôm looking for guidance on which certifications are best for beginners, especially if I want to explore SAP consulting or developer paths in the future.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Best regards,
Eklavya N.

entry.title: Launch of Role Based Certifications for SAP Business Suite for Partner Sales, Presales and CEE Roles
entry.content:
Dear SAP Partners!

We have exciting news to share!

Our SAP Partner Sales, Presales, and Customer Engagement Executives ‚Äì can now benefit from our freshly launched, Partner exclusive - Role Based Certifications for SAP Business Suite.

The three new SAP Business Suite certifications and associated Learning Journeys guide these revenue generating roles in the following ways

  • Positioning SAP Business Suite for Partner Sales Executive : Effectively positioning, leveraging SAP‚Äôs Partner strategy, understanding the sales methodologies & partner discounts leverage and engaging with proven approaches for driving customer value, aligning solutions to business priorities ‚Äì all dedicated to selling SAP Business Suite.
    • Role: Sales Executive
    • Certification Code: C_PSSBS_2505
    • Link to Certification
    • 30 Questions, 1 hour, 67 % Cut off Score
  • Positioning SAP Business Suite for Partner Presales Consultant: Effectively positioning SAP Business Suite by applying SAP‚Äôs "AI-First, Suite First" strategy and deliver proper discovery interviews that lead to effective presentations and demonstrations aligned to the buying center persona approach.
    • Role: Presales Consultant
    • Certification Code: C_PPSBS_2505
    • Link to Certification
    • 30 Questions, 1 hour, 67 % Cut off Score
  • Positioning SAP Business Suite for Partner CEE: Supporting and driving effective customer engagement with proven approaches for guiding customers through the full value lifecycle.
    • Role: Customer Engagement Executive
    • Certification Code: C_PCSBS_2505
    • Link to Certification
    • 30 Questions, 1 hour, 67 % Cut off Score

All key content has been combined into one streamlined learning experience.  

Please note that access to the learning content requires an S-user tied to an SAP PartnerEdge entity. Questions are handled via the support request in the SAP Partner Portal‚ÄØor‚ÄØin‚ÄØSAP for Me (Get Assistance - SAP for Me). 

Why do you need these Learning Journeys and Certifications?

As a valued member of the extended SAP Partner Ecosystem, we believe it's essential for all our partners to stay closely aligned with SAP‚Äôs partner strategy and collaborate on the go-to-market momentum around the SAP Business Suite. To help you stay current on critical learning, as well as the latest commercial and packaging updates, we are delivering all relevant content through our Learning Journeys. By completing the learning journey and earning the associated certification, you position yourself as a trusted advisor‚Äîequipped to understand, articulate, and effectively sell the SAP Business Suite.

Highlights of the Certification Process

  • The certification process includes a practical hands-on test, that can be completed either by uploading a pitch or by running through a demo.
  • This is followed by a proctored certification exam consisting of 30 questions that can be completed in an hour.  

Fast Track Academies to support your certification Journey:

We will, soon be launching Fast Track Certification Academies for Role Based Certifications for SAP Business Suite to help guide our learners through the content of these Learning Journeys.  Please stay tuned to this space/ bookmark this blog for the dates and registration links!

Coming soon and Stay Tuned!

  • Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Sales Executive
  • Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Presales Consultant
  • Fast Track your Role-Based Certification for the Partner Customer Engagement Executive

We encourage all our partners to adopt these certifications and proudly wear the badge of being SAP Certified and a trusted advisor on all things, SAP Business Suite!

entry.title: Celebrating two Decades of Excellence: Atos Honored with SAP‚Äôs Golden Certificate
entry.content:
For the tenth consecutive time, Atos had its SAP global operations and services certified and, as a result, has been awarded SAP‚Äôs prestigious Golden Certificate. This makes Atos only the second global partner to receive this special recognition ‚Äì a testament to the exceptional consistency and quality of their performance. As part of our partner ecosystem, Atos contributes to a group of globally certified partners recognized for consistently meeting SAP‚Äôs high standards across all regions. Their broad expertise across SAP solutions and their integration continues to earn our trust and respect. We deeply value our enduring partnership and appreciate Atos‚Äôs willingness to share their insights and experiences as a trusted, SAP-certified operations partner.

 

SAP: Atos positions itself as a pioneer in leveraging SAP Business Suite, cloud ERP, and AI to drive efficiency and innovation. What sets your approach to digital transformation apart from other providers, and how do you deliver measurable value across technologies for different industries?

Atos: New-age, AI-powered solutions from SAP are the core of our approach. Our strategy is to leverage platform capabilities from SAP BTP and hyperscalers to enable extended business solutions for application and business transformation. We provide value by leveraging comprehensive industry insights alongside our tailored industry solutions, consulting expertise, and transformation frameworks - all supported by advanced automation.

Our customers benefit from risk-mitigated transformation, cost-effective solutions, and increased user satisfaction by leveraging the full potential of SAP Business Suite on Cloud. Service Transformation is a key aspect of our approach for Application Management Services (AMS), where we leverage Joule for Developers, SAP Build process automation, and clean core with Atos Code-Pilot for custom-code reverse engineering.

 

SAP: What motivated you to pursue global certification for one of your services for the first time in 2004, and how do you reflect on that decision today?

Atos: Our strategy has always focused on achieving global presence and global recognition. To make that a reality, we set out to be globally certified with SAP in 2004. Now, with 20 years of continuous Global Certification across all key domains, we believe our decision has strengthened our business, enhanced customer trust, and supported SAP through robust partnerships, increased credibility, and expanded service offerings.

 

 

SAP: Since your initial certifications, you have expanded your global certification scope over the years. Not only have you re-certified your original certifications multiple times, but you have also added several new ones. Atos has recently renewed its five global certifications: SAP S/4HANA solutions operations, SAP SuccessFactors solutions operations, SAP HANA operations, SAP BTP operations, and DevOps. What role do the certifications, including the audit, play in your service offering?

Atos: Certifications have enabled us to identify areas for improvement in our offerings and recognize the strengths of Atos‚Äôs capabilities and services. Each certification cycle has resulted in the development of more comprehensive solutions that address customers‚Äô IT transformation needs. Additionally, certifications assist in aligning our work with SAP‚Äôs product roadmap and preparing for future developments.

 

 

SAP: To what extent are the certifications helpful in your marketing activities and your communication with customers? Do you actively reference your global certifications when engaging with new customers?

Atos: Yes, we do highlight our certifications to new and existing customers. It helps in proving that we possess the right capabilities, offerings, experience, and follow SAP standards for each phase of the application management lifecycle. Certification showcases our credibility in the market, both to customers and our other partners in the SAP ecosystem (e.g., Microsoft, Amazon, Google).

 

Information on the certification program for operations partners and an overview of all certified partners can be found in the SAP Operations Partner Guide.

Visit OPC at SAP.com

entry.title: Ensure Smooth Integration: Your Quick Guide to SAP Data Services Compatibility ‚úÖ
entry.content:
üì¢Installation & Upgrade Guide for SAP Data Services üõ†Ô∏è

üí°When installing or upgrading, compatibility questions are bound to arise since we deal with different databases, drivers, applications and other components.

Compatibility Checklist

‚úÖ Ensuring a Certified Environment To confirm compatibility with your target (new) version of SAP Data Services, verify the following:

üîçInformation platform services (IPS) / Business Intelligence Platform (BIP)
üîç Operating System
üîç Database (Repository / Source & Target)
üîç Drivers
üîç Browser
üîç Cloud Platforms
üîç Cloud Storage
üîç Message Client Library
üîç Etc.

Understanding the Compatibility Legend

üåüMake sure you understand its legend, as it is crucial to proceed:

  • For example: If item y was certified in version 4.x SPx Patch x, it will be considered as supported/compatible for that version and above until the version being mentioned as deprecated in the PAM in the future.

üñ•Designer Client Tool

Application client tool, named as Designer, needs to be under the same version, support pack and Patch of SAP Data Services Job Server to avoid any compatibility within the Job Server and CMS (component from IPS/BI application).

Because of this need for harmony, the Designer tool can't share a machine with another BI/IPS installation, even if you're not using that CMS connection for SAP Data Services. But don't worry! If you need IPS/BI installed, just make sure it's compatible according to our compatibility matrix.

üîó 3322026 - Can BOE/BI/IPS Platform Client Tools and Designer Client Tool coexist in the same machine? - SAP Data Services

üìöUseful Resources

Each SAP product has its Product Availability Matrix (PAM) and Maintenance Strategy. For more information on how to access these, check out the KBA below:

üîó 1338845 - How to find Product Availability Matrix (PAM) / Supported Platforms Documentation for SAP BusinessObjects products (BI/IPS, DS, IS)?

Visit the SAP Data Services for detailed information on Installation, Upgrade, and Migration steps. Remember to change the documentation version to your desired SAP Data Services version.

Recommendation

üí° We strongly recommend installing/upgrading to the latest certified version between IPS/BIP and SAP Data Services to avoid any known issues that have been fixed.

  • If upgrading is not possible, before proceeding with the installation or upgrade, check the Release Notes for that version under the SAP Knowledge Base. There might be known issues that could affect your daily work.
  • This will help you identify and be prepared to apply any available workaround!

üåüIf you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out to SAP Support and search under our Knowledge Base!

üìåIf you found this helpful or interesting, I would really appreciate a 'Kudo' to let me know! Your feedback means a lot. üòä
